Package org.jets3t.gui.skins.html

Skinning implementation to make Swing GUI applications/applets look more like a standard HTML web pages.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SkinnedJButton A skinned JButton, which is actually just a standard button - useful only as a base for someone to specialise.
SkinnedJHtmlLabel A skinned JHtmlLabel, which is actually just a standard label - useful only as a base for someone to specialise.
SkinnedJPanel A skinned JPanel, which is actually just a standard panel - useful only as a base for someone to specialise.
SkinnedLookAndFeel A specialisation of the default Metal theme that allows specific colours and fonts to be used instead of those in the Metal theme.
 

Package org.jets3t.gui.skins.html Description

Skinning implementation to make Swing GUI applications/applets look more like a standard HTML web pages.

Since:
0.5.0
